title: quickeyg
author: quickeyg
content: Highly recommended.Beautiful beautiful spectacular amazing boxing event coming up fight fans. These fights will get you up off your seat throwing punches and jabbing, probably smiling and laughing maybe crying with joy. People, plan your fight party now sports fans. Some advice: Hide the best food away LOL. Folks I know are some serious eating hippo's.October 28th, Saudi ArabiaTyson Fury vs Francis Ngannou (Main Event)Fabio Wardley Vs. David AdeleyeMartin Bakole Vs. Carlos TakamJoseph Parker Vs. Simon KeanArslanbek Makhmudov Vs. Agron SmakiciTyson Fury having defeated Dillian Whyte and Derek Chisora last year selling out Wembley Stadium and the Spurs Stadium plus sold in the region of 153,000 tickets Tyson Fury is back.Fury is known for beating Wladimir Klitschko in 2015 for the majority of the heavyweight belts and the memorable Trilogy fights with the American Deontay Wilder winning by TKO (2nd fight) and KO (3rd fight)First fight being a draw.Francis Ngannou left the UFC having been unable to agree a deal with Dana White and being a threat to Jon Bones Jones. Ngannou is being trained by Mike Tyson for this fight against Tyson Fury.It's an afternoon fight in Canada and America - mid day in Australia and New Zealand Please Note: #furyngannou on twitter. The undercard is excellent with many heavyweight fights (Enjoy)

comments.body: Had to lookup to check if Fury was THE Tyson. No. Isn't.
